name: @tlt/infinite-gallery
description: Infinite gallery component. You set an image-provider, the component makes you scroll smoothly through all the images it provides
author: Per Steffensen <steff@teletronics.ae>

scripts.build-browser: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.clean: rimraf dist dist-node && mkdirp dist dist-node
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist && git add -A dist-node
